building core_castle_building
{
    convert_to core_building
    levels motte_and_bailey wooden_castle castle fortress citadel 
    {

            capability

                wall_level 0

building tower
{
    convert_to castle_tower
    levels ballista_towers cannon_towers 
    {
        ballista_towers city requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            convert_to 0
            capability
            {
                tower_level 2
            }
            material stone
            construction  3 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                cannon_towers
            }
        }
        cannon_towers city requires factions { northern_european, moors, mali, zimbabwe, egypt, turks, timurids, milan, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, }  and event_counter gunpowder_discovered 1 
        {
            convert_to 1
            capability
            {
                tower_level 3
            }
            material stone
            construction  4 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building castle_tower
{
    convert_to tower
    levels c_ballista_towers c_cannon_towers 
    {
        c_ballista_towers castle requires factions { northern_european, middle_eastern, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            convert_to 0
            capability
            {
                tower_level 2
            }
            material stone
            construction  3 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                c_cannon_towers
            }
        }
        c_cannon_towers castle requires factions { northern_european, moors, mali, egypt, turks, zimbabwe, timurids, milan, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, }  and event_counter gunpowder_discovered 1 
        {
            convert_to 1
            capability
            {
                tower_level 3
            }
            material stone
            construction  4 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

    {

        {
            capability
            {
                recruit_pool "Hobilars"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { england, }

building barracks
{
    convert_to castle_barracks
    levels town_watch town_guard city_watch militia_drill_square militia_barracks army_barracks royal_armoury 
    {
        town_watch city requires factions { northern_european, moors, mali, egypt, turks, timurids, zimbabwe, milan, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            convert_to 1
            capability
            {
                recruit_pool "Town Militia"  1   0.2   2  0  requires factions { sicily, venice, } 
                recruit_pool "Italian Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { papal_states, } 
                recruit_pool "EE Town Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { poland, hungary, } 
                recruit_pool "EE Archer Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { russia, } 
                recruit_pool "SE Town Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { byzantium, }
                recruit_pool "Khmer_Spearmen"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { sicily, }
       		recruit_pool "clevy in light spearmen"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { milan, timurids, }  
                recruit_pool "Khmer Archers"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { sicily, }
                recruit_pool "ME Town Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { moors, mali, turks, mongols, timurids, milan, ryukyu, } 
                recruit_pool "ME Archer Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { egypt, } 
                law_bonus bonus 1
            }
            material wooden
            construction  2 
            cost  600 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                town_guard
            }
        }
        town_guard city requires factions { northern_european, moors, mali, egypt, turks, timurids, milan, zimbabwe, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            convert_to 2
            capability
            {
                recruit_pool "Spear Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { england, scotland, france, hre, denmark, spain, portugal, } 
                recruit_pool "Italian Spear Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { papal_states, } 
                recruit_pool "EE Spear Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { poland, russia, hungary, } 
                recruit_pool "SE Spear Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { byzantium, } 
                recruit_pool "ME Spear Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { moors, mali, egypt, turks, timurids, milan, } 
                recruit_pool "Town Militia"  1   0.2   2  0  requires factions { sicily, venice, } 
                recruit_pool "Italian Militia"  1   0.7   6  0  requires factions { papal_states, } 
                recruit_pool "EE Town Militia"  1   0.7   6  0  requires factions { poland, hungary, } 
                recruit_pool "EE Archer Militia"  1   0.7   6  0  requires factions { russia, } 
                recruit_pool "SE Town Militia"  1   0.7   6  0  requires factions { byzantium, } 
                recruit_pool "Zimbabwe Nobles"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { zimbabwe, }

building castle_barracks
{
    convert_to barracks
    levels mustering_hall garrison_quarters drill_square barracks armoury 
    {

        {
            capability
            {
                recruit_pool "Peasants"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { england, france, hre, denmark, spain, portugal, papal_states, }

building castle_siege
{
    convert_to siege
    levels c_ballista_range c_catapult_range c_siege_works 
    {
        c_ballista_range castle requires factions { northern_european, moors, mali, egypt, turks, timurids, milan, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            convert_to 0
            capability
            {
                recruit_pool "NE Ballista"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { england, scotland, france, hre, denmark, spain, portugal, papal_states, } 
                recruit_pool "EE Ballista"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { poland, russia, hungary, } 
                recruit_pool "GR Ballista"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { byzantium, } 
                recruit_pool "ME Ballista"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { moors, mali, egypt, turks, timurids, milan, } 
                recruit_pool "AS Ballista"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { mongols, china, saxons, ryukyu, sicily, venice, } 
            }
            material wooden
            construction  3 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                c_catapult_range
            }
        }
        c_catapult_range castle requires factions { northern_european, moors, mali, egypt, turks, timurids, milan, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            convert_to 1

                recruit_pool "NE Catapult"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { england, scotland, france, hre, denmark, spain, portugal, papal_states, }

                recruit_pool "GR Ballista"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { byzantium, }

building cannon
{
    convert_to castle_cannon
    levels gunsmith cannon_maker cannon_foundry royal_arsenal 
    {
        gunsmith city requires factions { northern_european, moors, mali, egypt, turks, timurids, milan, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, }  and event_counter gunpowder_discovered 1 
        {
            convert_to 0
            capability
            {
                recruit_pool "NE Bombard"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { england, scotland, france, hre, denmark, spain, portugal, papal_states, }

            }

            cost  800

                cannon_maker
            }
        }

building castle_cannon
{
    convert_to cannon
    levels c_gunsmith c_cannon_maker c_cannon_foundry c_royal_arsenal 
    {
        c_gunsmith castle requires factions { northern_european, moors, mali, egypt, turks, timurids, milan, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, }  and event_counter gunpowder_discovered 1 
        {
            convert_to 0
            capability
            {
                recruit_pool "NE Bombard"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { england, scotland, france, hre, denmark, spain, portugal, papal_states, }

                recruit_pool "GR Bombard"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { byzantium, }

            }
            material wooden
            construction  3 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades

                c_cannon_maker
            }
        }

                recruit_pool "NE Mortar"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { england, scotland, papal_states, } 
                recruit_pool "NE Grand Bombard"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { france, hre, spain, portugal, } 
                recruit_pool "NE Ribault"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { denmark, } 
                recruit_pool "AS Bombard"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { china, ryukyu, sicily, venice, }
                recruit_pool "EE Ribault"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { poland, hungary, } 
                recruit_pool "EE Grand Bombard"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { russia, } 
                recruit_pool "ME Grand Bombard"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { moors, egypt, turks, } 
                recruit_pool "NE Ribault"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { england, scotland, spain, portugal, papal_states, } 
                recruit_pool "NE Bombard"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { england, scotland, france, hre, denmark, spain, portugal, papal_states, } 
                recruit_pool "EE Bombard"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { poland, russia, hungary, } 
                recruit_pool "GR Bombard"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { byzantium, } 
                recruit_pool "ME Bombard"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { moors, egypt, turks, } 
                recruit_pool "AS Rocket Launcher"  1   0.4   3  0  requires factions { mongols, china, saxons, ryukyu, sicily, venice, } 
                weapon_naval_gunpowder 1
            }
            material wooden
            construction  6 
            cost  6400 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins

}

                recruit_pool "carrack"  1   1   3  0  requires factions { northern_european, } 
                recruit_pool "dhow"  1   1   3  0  requires factions { middle_eastern, venice, sicily, mongols, saxons, ryukyu, normans, china, }

                recruit_pool "war galley"  1   1   3  0  requires factions { egypt, moors, mali, turks, }

                recruit_pool "cog"  1   1   3  0  requires factions { russia, } 
                recruit_pool "war galley"  1   1   3  0  requires factions { hungary, }

                recruit_pool "gun holk"  1   1   3  0  requires factions { russia, poland, }

                recruit_pool "grande carrack"  1   1   3  0  requires factions { portugal, spain, }

            }
            material wooden

                recruit_pool "Bill Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { england, } 
                recruit_pool "Heavy Pike Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { scotland, }

                recruit_pool "Halberd Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { hre, papal_states, poland, hungary, }

                recruit_pool "Swordsmen Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { spain, portugal, }

                recruit_pool "ME Halberd Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { egypt, turks, timurids, milan, }
                construction_cost_bonus_stone bonus 30
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
            }
            faction_capability

            }

building convert_to_castle
{
    convert_to convert_to_city
    levels village_to_wooden_castle small_town_to_stone_keep large_town_to_castle 
    {
        village_to_wooden_castle city requires factions { denmark, hre, scotland, france, england, middle_eastern, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            convert_to 0
            capability
            {
            }
            material wooden
            construction  1 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min village
            upgrades
            {
                small_town_to_stone_keep
            }
        }
        small_town_to_stone_keep city requires factions { denmark, hre, scotland, france, england, middle_eastern, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            convert_to 1
            capability
            {
            }
            material wooden
            construction  1 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                large_town_to_castle
            }
        }
        large_town_to_castle city requires factions { denmark, hre, scotland, france, england, middle_eastern, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            convert_to 2
            capability
            {
            }
            material wooden
            construction  2 
            cost  3200 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building convert_to_city
{
    convert_to convert_to_castle
    levels wooden_castle_to_village stone_keep_to_small_town castle_to_large_town large_castle_to_city fortress_to_city 
    {
        wooden_castle_to_village castle requires factions { denmark, hre, scotland, france, england, middle_eastern, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            convert_to 0
            capability
            {
            }
            material wooden
            construction  1 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min village
            upgrades
            {
                stone_keep_to_small_town
            }
        }
        stone_keep_to_small_town castle requires factions { denmark, hre, scotland, france, england, middle_eastern, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            convert_to 1
            capability
            {
            }
            material wooden
            construction  1 
            cost  1200 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                castle_to_large_town
            }
        }
        castle_to_large_town castle requires factions { denmark, hre, scotland, france, england, middle_eastern, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            convert_to 2
            capability
            {
            }
            material wooden
            construction  2 
            cost  1600 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                large_castle_to_city
            }
        }
        large_castle_to_city castle requires factions { denmark, hre, scotland, france, england, middle_eastern, asian, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            capability

            cost  3200

            }
        }

            }
        }

building temple_pagan
{
    religion pagan
    levels pyramid great_pyramid high_temple 
    {
        pyramid city requires factions { mesoamerican, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent priest  0  requires factions { mesoamerican, } 
                recruit_pool "Aztec Spearmen"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { aztecs, } 
                recruit_pool "Batab Militia"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { mayans, } 
                recruit_pool "Aztec Spear Throwers"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { incans, } 
                religion_level bonus 1
                law_bonus bonus 1
                agent_limit priest 1
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
            }
            material stone
            construction  4 
            cost  1000 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades

                great_pyramid
            }
        }
        great_pyramid city requires factions { aztecs, mayans, incans, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent priest  0  requires factions { mesoamerican, } 
                recruit_pool "Aztec Spearmen"  1   0.7   6  0  requires factions { aztecs, } 
                recruit_pool "Aztec Warriors"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { aztecs, } 
                recruit_pool "Coyote Priests"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { aztecs, } 
                recruit_pool "Batab Militia"  1   0.7   6  0  requires factions { mayans, } 
                recruit_pool "Jaguar Warriors"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { mayans, } 
                recruit_pool "Aztec Spear Throwers"  1   0.7   6  0  requires factions { incans, }  
                recruit_pool "Native Inca Warriors"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { incans, } 
                religion_level bonus 2
                law_bonus bonus 1
                stage_races 1
                agent_limit priest 1
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
            }
            material stone
            construction  8 
            cost  1500 
            settlement_min large_town

                high_temple
            }
        }
        high_temple city requires factions { aztecs, mayans, incans, }

            capability

                agent priest  0  requires factions { mesoamerican, }

                recruit_pool "Aztec Warriors"  1   0.7   6  0  requires factions { aztecs, } 
                recruit_pool "Coyote Priests"  1   0.7   6  0  requires factions { aztecs, }

                recruit_pool "Aztec Spear Throwers"  1   0.7   6  0  requires factions { incans, } 
                recruit_pool "Temple Guard"  1   1   9  0  requires factions { mayans, }

    religion pagan
    levels horse_tipi horse_wigwam horse_longhouse 
    {
        horse_tipi city requires factions { apachean, }  and event_counter indian_horses_1 1 
        {
            capability

                recruit_pool "Mounted Apache"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { apachean, }
            }
            material wooden
            construction  1 
            cost  400

            }
        }
        horse_wigwam city requires factions { apachean, }  and event_counter indian_horses_1 1 
        {
            capability

                recruit_pool "Mounted Thunder Brave"  1   0.5   4  0  requires factions { apachean, }  and event_counter indian_guns_1 1 
            }
            material wooden
            construction  2 
            cost  800 
            settlement_min village

            }
        }
        horse_longhouse city requires factions { apachean, }  and event_counter indian_horses_1 1 
        {
            capability
            {
                recruit_pool "Mounted Apache"  1   1   9  0  requires factions { apachean, } 
                recruit_pool "Mounted Thunder Brave"  1   0.7   6  0  requires factions { apachean, }  and event_counter indian_guns_1 1 
                heavy_cavalry_bonus bonus 1
